xxl.core.collections.containers.io

Class ConverterContainerRawAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • xxl.core.collections.containers.AbstractContainer
      • xxl.core.collections.containers.ConstrainedDecoratorContainer

          • xxl.core.collections.containers.io.ConverterContainerRawAccess
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Container

    public class ConverterContainerRawAccess
extends ConverterContainer
    This class extends a ConverterContainer with functionality for flushing arrays of blocks.
